code: import{useState}from"react";import InputWithError from"../../../animations/input-error-field.js";import topicController from"../../../controllers/TOPIC-controller.js";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const optionsOfWhatHappend=await topicController.getListOfWhatHappend();const ProblemEnter=_ref=>{let{problem,setProblem,error,setError,errorRed}=_ref;const[localProblem,setLocalProblem]=useState("");const inputRadioCheck=e=>{setProblem(e.value);};const isChecked=index=>{if(optionsOfWhatHappend.indexOf(problem)===index){return true;}else{return false;}};const isCheckedUserInput=()=>{if(problem===""||optionsOfWhatHappend.includes(problem)){return false;}else{return true;}};const setValue=()=>{if(optionsOfWhatHappend.includes(problem)){return"";}else{return problem;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blockPhase",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u0427\u0442\u043E \u0441\u043B\u0443\u0447\u0438\u043B\u043E\u0441\u044C?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"listOfOptions",onChange:e=>inputRadioCheck(e.target),children:[optionsOfWhatHappend.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"option",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",value:item,name:"check",checked:isChecked(index)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item})]},index);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"urInput",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",className:"urInput-radio",value:localProblem,name:"check",checked:isCheckedUserInput()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"create-topic-input-size",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputWithError,{placeholder:"Ваш вариант",value:setValue(),setValue:setLocalProblem,error:error})})]})]})]});};export default ProblemEnter;
